article_title: CVS Reports A Strong Q4'13 Backed By Growth In Retail Pharmacy & Services

article_metadata.description: On a 12-month basis, CVS estimates that it will loose approximately $2 billion in annual revenue from tobacco sales and an additional $0.5 billion from the rest of the shoppers’ basket. Given the expected timing for implementing this change, this will cost $0.06 to $0.09 per share in 2014.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
